title: Fighting Zoe is literally fighting Cancer
body: TY rito for the worst laning experience in my life

replies.body: Please, if my Grandma can fight and beat cancer, you have no excuse.
Ask your grandma how to beat cancer.
Supp Zoe is the most cancerous Zoe
i run at her on olaf and she dies pretty quickly, all while failing to get away.

Because going {{champion:2}} mid not knowing who your lane opponent is just incase they pick {{champion:142}} is a great strategy
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

no the jungler realizes shes got no mobility outside of sums, and her little dash is nothing more than a farce because she has to go back to her casting location making it just an artificial stasis in which im still free to chuck axes(poke) at her and just wait. 

and shes got low movement speed so theres that. anyone can do this.
oh yeah,you just have to use his direct counter (who's used in other lanes) and you can beat her! Simple and balanced!

If you play a squishy then yes it is. I played her on PBE and she didnt seem as bad as she is now IDK if its the AP ratio or if PBE is weird since ppl try new stuff. But she basically one shot me as corki with like 2 kills from ganks and little farm

> [{quoted}](name=Paladin 0f Life,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=LKein2pN,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2017-11-23T23:42:55.858+0000)
>
> If you play a squishy then yes it is. I played her on PBE and she didnt seem as bad as she is now IDK if its the AP ratio or if PBE is weird since ppl try new stuff. But she basically one shot me as corki with like 2 kills from ganks and little farm

Note i had {{item:1033}} and bought hex

Yeah if she hits you with one sleepy bubble you are dead. Her q is super fast and isn't nearly as hard to land as Riot would like us to believe. 

You will have a much harder time landing a max range, slower moving {{champion:76}} spear than a {{champion:142}} explosive bullet.
lol as soon as I saw her kit I saw the potential. A delayed long cc ability and a nuke.  Those two make a deadly combination on veigar let alone a champ that gets mobility and extra summoner spells.
{{champion:16}} I thought I was the literal cancer of League?

Zoe is the ASPECT Of  Soraka hell no she is the aspect of bullshrimp
{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

What people don’t realize is that:

It is SO EASY to move out of the way of her Q.

Like, painfully easy.

A bad Zoe player will not use walls to her advantage and you’ll have 1-2 seconds where you can SEE her cast it. Once it’s travelling she can’t move it in the air, so just take a few steps back.

A GOOD Zoe will cast this over walls with her ult. 
Literally just move to the side.  It has a low detonation radius so if you’re even a little bit off it won’t hit.


If you get E’d, well then you deserve  the horrible 1000 damage at level 6.

And also: in order to do max damage the Q needs to travel a VERY long distance. Basically a cast directly behind you, plus flash plus an ult forward then recasting it for like 2000 units of movement. I’ve tried it out.
